cab.content: CAP'..... - .......t .s the Lperty of12^LjgP^^ ' 123BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 7th JULY, 1918.It WESTERN FRONT *The General Situation remains unchangod.A few prisoners and a machine gun wore captured , yesterday in a raid East of HAMEL; and la3t night the Australian Corps advanced their line N.E. of VILLERS * BRETONNEUX to a depth of 400 yards on a front of 2,000 yards *2. ITALIAN FRONT.Third Army. During the afternoon of yesterday the Italians oompleted their occupation of tho right bank of the NEW PIAVE, From. 15th June to 6th July the captures mado by tte Italians amount to 523 officers. 23,911 other ranks, 63 guns and 1,234 machine guns. In addition, they have completely recovered their lost artillery *General. Staff,War Of floe, S.W.1* 7th July, 1918.Issued at 12,20 p.m.
